State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Curator's comments: Mint uncertain. In Bibliothèque National de France’s catalogue (BNCMER Auguste) mint attributed to Pergamum.
Bibliographic references: RE1 / Coins of the Roman Empire in the British Museum, vol. 1: Augustus to Vitellius (655, p.106)
PCR / Principal coins of the Romans: Volume I: The Republic c. 290 - 31 BC; Volume II: The Principate 31 BC - AD 296; Volume III: The Dominate AD 294 - 498. (323)
RR2 / Coins of the Roman Republic in the British Museum, vol. 2. Coinages of Rome (continued), Roman Campania, Italy, the social war, and the provinces. (250, p.537)
RIC1 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. 1 (544, p.86)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015-2016 29 Oct–7 Feb, London, BM, G35, Egypt: faith after the pharaohs.
